body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Curriculum Materials               Curriculum Materials       PARKS AS CLASSROOMS (PAC)  Curriculum for Grades 2-5 Curriculum for Grades 6-8   Curriculum for Grades 9-12 Following the Civil War, African-American soldiers were offered the chance to serve in the U.S. peacetime Army.
